title: Club problem
body:
My club (i'm the leader) doesn't appear on my acount anymore but evryone who is in my club says im still there and still the leader but i cant see anything.
It happened right after the problems with clubs.

replies.body:
Got the same problem! ^^ 
Hope it'll be fixed soon.

This has been an issue we've been seeing for a few club owners since [clubs were restored](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Our clubs team is looking for a solution on this, but I don't have an eta right now.  Hang tight until this is fixed up!
